about_the_game:
synopsis============================================
God, save the king of man!
Life on the Atelian continent, where many races coexist, is like that of the jungle.
In a world of disorder in which the weak fall and the strong conquer him, the answer to survival is only individual.

The Elf, the ruler of time and technology, the Devil, the revolutionary of curses and magic-
Suin, the strongman of resourcefulness and physical strength, and Dwarf, the resistance of will and steel.
The kingdom of man caught between them was waiting for the days of destruction without doing anything.

But God has not given up hope yet.
You who have sat on the throne of man after the predecessor. Save the kingdom in crisis!


Producer Information============================================
Produced by Yujin Games
Illustration: RAMU
Original Illustration: AROMDAMI
Logo Help: Chivu
Edit Text: Wings


game play============================================
The game is a strategic game in which you become the king of the kingdom and rule the country, and you reach the end by dating the female leader of the surrounding country.
The game will be played according to the steps below.

1. domestic phase
→ Ministers from the Ministry of Economy/Defense/Social/Foreign Affairs come to users and present their options for the problems they have.
→ If you choose that option, the statistics of economy/defense/social/diplomacy will go up or down.
→ Depending on the value of the stat, a higher potential option is output, which can reduce other statistics.
→ The user repeats this choice four times before moving on to the date phase.

2. Date Phase
→ One of the leaders of the Elf Empire, the Devil Republic, the Dwarf Republic, and the Suin Empire comes to the user.
→ Users talk to them and choose the options they offer.
→ In this case, the statistics of diplomacy may increase, and the favorability of the hero may increase.
→ The user repeats the internal phase after completing this selection.

3. Ending Phase
→ The user who repeats this phase reaches the end.
→ An event occurs that risks the fate of the kingdom, and the user makes the last choice to risk the fate of the kingdom accordingly.
→ In this case, you will have a different ending depending on the favorability of the stat or hero of the kingdom.


difference from the original============================================
→ Illustration, Background, UI, Logo Renewal
→ Full text editing increases readability
→ While maintaining the character and story of the original, a large-scale remaster was conducted in the visual area.


Manipulation============================================
Select: left mouse click
Line Progress: left-click, scroll down the mouse, enter key
Image skip: keyboard ESC key


Resolution============================================
The game is fixed at a 16:9 ratio resolution for optimal play.
Please refer to this when adjusting the resolution.

name: 그랑 엠파이어 : 그래픽 리마스터

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The great powers and the human kingdom surrounded by them are, so to speak, like the moe of East Asia. Save the human kingdom in crisis, and aim for their hearts, the leaders of great powers!
